assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: GRCS Inc. provides governance risk management and compliance software and security products in Japan and internationally. It offers Enterprise Risk MT, a company-wide risk management tool; Supplier Risk MT, an outsourcer management tool that streamlines outsourced management operations and supports business decisions through dashboards; and OneTrust, a cloud application that supports compliance with personal information protection regulations, such as General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The company also provides cyber security risk management products comprises CSIRT MT.mss, an incident management tool for computer security incident response team; Vulnerability TODAY, an email delivery service to collects, analyze, and organize daily vulnerability information; and Simpler Z, a cloud-based educational service to learn compliance and security. In addition, it offers Netskope, a cloud access security broker that provides functions to optimize risks; managed security services for next-generation anti-virus (NGAV) and incident response/threat hunting/endpoint detection and response, as well as supports threat removal, such as endpoint isolation and malware removal, and recurrence prevention measures; HP Sure Click Enterprise powered by Bromium, an endpoint protection that performs internet and web isolation on endpoints; and VMware Carbon Black, a cloud service platform that integrates NGAV and EDR. Further, the company provides SecureCube/Access Check, a gateway-type privileged identity management solution; and Imperva Incapsula, a cloud security service that protects websites with web application firewall, DDoS countermeasures, global load balancing, and content delivery network. It also offers consulting services in the areas of governance, risk, and compliance services, as well as security product introduction and operation support, cloud security measures, GRCS academy, etc. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
